last_episode_to_air.name: Mirage
last_episode_to_air.overview: Faizan and Parveen plans to leave for London amongst uncertainties regarding the threat. Sa mar discovers the mastermind behind the crime and pursues to catch them. The final encounter reveals how the young couple were trapped by the mastermind. He remains elusive till Samar gets a glimpse of the uncomfortable truth.

name: Sin
overview: Mysterious death of a young girl in the hills triggers a suspicious investigation that reveals the alleys of a high-profile organized crime in Kolkata, involving Drugs, sex-trafficking and murders.
